title: looking for a couple of players
body:
hey everyone,

looking for some players to make a flex team for the up coming clash games.
right now in s4 solo q andf bronze 3 in flex, would like players round that rank but if your willing to play and want to win im down.
mic and discord would be great as well, discord not so much coz of league voice now.

if you wanna give it a go add me on league 

cheers everyone

replies.body:
Hell yea man hit me up :)
{{champion:875}}
